media.title: The Secret Lair
media.description: Our legendary practice shed. Where the magic (and several noise complaints) happen.

media.title: DeadBeat's Kit
media.description: The drums that launched a thousand hangovers. Vintage Ludwig (don't let the bass drum fool you).

media.title: SnowMan's Guitars
media.description: A collection of six-strings and bad decisions. Each one has a story we probably shouldn't tell.

media.title: Brass Knuckles (Live Rehearsal)
media.description: Raw footage from the shed. Before the polish. Before the mixing. Before we sobered up.

media.title: The Empty Room Gig
media.description: Our most intimate performance. Population: 2 (us). Plus one very confused bartender.

media.title: Behind the Shed
media.description: What happens behind the shed stays behind the shed. But here's photographic evidence anyway.

media.title: The Original Lineup (1997)
media.description: When we had hair, hope, and hearing. Historical document of our questionable youth.

media.title: Ecclestiastics Behind the Scenes
media.description: Watch us pretend we know what we're doing in a real studio. Spoiler: We didn't.
